name: Send an email alert when a customer places more than 2 orders in 24 hours

options.email_subject__required: {{ order.customer.email }} has placed >= 2 orders in the last 24 hours
options.email_body__required_multiline: Hello, The customer {{ order.customer.email }} has exceeded the configured order threshold. Manage this customer in Shopify Thanks, Mechanic, for {{ shop.name }}

docs:
Use this task to receive an email alert whenever a single customer exceeds a configurable order count, over the last configurable number of hours.

Note: This task does not distinguish by order source. When counting orders, all order sources are considered (e.g. the online storefront, the Shopify admin, other apps, etc).
